summary: REQ-18 appears partially implemented: a new `.shine-text` utility with a shine keyframe animation and a `prefers-reduced-motion: reduce` override was added in `frontend/src/index.css`, and `AppLayout.tsx` footer was modified (truncated) with indications of a shiny credit. However, due to truncation of `AppLayout.tsx`, the exact required footer text and its application across all shared-layout pages cannot be conclusively verified from the provided diff summary. Additionally, `AppLayout.tsx` shows navigation/routing-related elements that may conflict with the non-goals, but itâ€™s unclear if those were newly introduced in this diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Footer displays the exact text "Made By Sunyad Ahmed Shrabon" on all pages that render the shared layout/footer.
missing_requirements.reason: The `AppLayout.tsx` footer section is truncated in the diff, so the presence of the exact required string and its placement in the global footer cannot be confirmed from the provided evidence.

missing_requirements.requirement: No user-facing text is added in any language other than English.
missing_requirements.reason: Because the `AppLayout.tsx` changes are truncated, any additional user-facing text potentially added near the footer cannot be fully reviewed.

hallucinated_features.description: Potential navigation/routing changes (e.g., inclusion of a 'Home' nav item and multiple route paths in shared layout).
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest explicitly lists routing/navigation changes as non-goals, but the modified `AppLayout.tsx` includes a navigation menu with paths such as `/home`, `/notices`, `/homework`, `/routine`, `/schedule`, and `/admin`. From the diff summary alone, it is not clear that these were solely pre-existing; if newly introduced/altered, they would exceed scope.
